text: Rūze mardoni munofiqu zanoni munofiq ʙa kasone, ki imon ovardaand, megūjand: «Ba mo nigoh kuned, to az nuraton ravşanī girem!» Fariştagon ʙarojaşon tamasxūrona gūjand: «Ba aqiʙ ʙa dunjo ʙozgarded va az on ço nur ʙitalaʙed!» Ongoh mijoni onho devore zada meşavad, ki ʙar on devor dare ʙoşad, daruni on ki rū ʙa mū'minon ast rahmat ʙoşadu ʙeruni on ki rū ʙa munofiqon ast, azoʙ ast
